title: 16A.04 BUDGET AND CASH PROJECTION.
text:
The commissioner shall prepare the biennial budget with projections of revenues and expenditures for both the biennial budget period and the biennium following the biennial budget period. The governor shall supervise the preparation unless there is a governor-elect, who then shall provide the supervision.
[Repealed, 1984 c 628 art 2 s 4]
[Repealed, 1984 c 628 art 2 s 4]
[Renumbered 16A.041]
